lead_paragraph: Nearly 7,000 civilians have been killed in the war in eastern Ukraine between government forces and Russian-backed separatists since fighting erupted last year.

headline.print_headline: Ukraine: Leader Gives War’s Grim Toll
headline.main: Ukraine: Leader Gives War’s Grim Toll

snippet: Nearly 7,000 civilians have been killed in the war in eastern Ukraine between government forces and Russian-backed separatists since fighting erupted last year.
